event.title: "Public Money Public Code – Global problems need global solutions!" online presentation at Özgürkon

body.p: Alexander Sander, FSFE's Policy Manager will give a talk at ÖzgürKon, Turkey. on "Public Money? Public Code! – Global problems need global solutions!" ÖzgürKon is an international online conference, bringing worldwide free software community together in virtual space and underline the importance of free software in the light of current developments.
